scripts.presetup: mkdir -p components/ui && if [ ! -f components.json ]; then echo '{"components": []}' > components.json; fi
scripts.createfiles: touch components/ui/card.tsx && touch components/ui/input.tsx && touch components/ui/select.tsx && touch components/ui/button.tsx && touch components/ui/badge.tsx
scripts.setup: if [ -f components.json ]; then npx shadcn init && npx shadcn add card && npx shadcn add input && npx shadcn add select && npx shadcn add button && npx shadcn add badge; fi
